 2012-16222012-12-06,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActCurrency Act
SubjectRegulations for the Redemption of One Cent Coins
PrecisREGULATIONS FOR THE REDEMPTION OF ONE CENT COINS authorizing the Minister of Finance to redeem one cent coins and (1) maintain confidence that the penny will retain its value; and (2) support an orderly pace of withdrawal of pennies from the economy.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0264 Publication Date: 2012-12-19
